<script type="text/javascript">


        function getGeminiContent(languageID) {

             var product_description = $('input[name="product_description[' + languageID + '][name]"]');
             var description = $('textarea[name="product_description[' + languageID + '][description]"]');
             var meta_description = $('textarea[name="product_description[' + languageID + '][meta_description]"]');
             var meta_title = $('input[name="product_description[' + languageID + '][meta_title]"]');
             var meta_keyword = $('textarea[name="product_description[' + languageID + '][meta_keyword]"]');
             var tag = $('input[name="product_description[' + languageID + '][tag]"]');
             $(description).parent('div').loading();
             $(meta_description).loading();
             $(meta_title).loading();
             $(meta_keyword).loading();
             $(tag).loading();


        }

    </script>
